name: Cloak Cat
description:
Cloak Cat

A simple dungeon crawler roguelike developed to explore PCG in level generation.

In this game, you play as a cloaked cat exploring an ever-changing dungeon. As you explore, you must battle off ghosts to proceed. Magical portals allow you to explore the dungeon even deeper. How many levels can you traverse before succumbing to the challenge?

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space Bar to shoot

You can play the game in full-screen mode by clicking icon in the game's bottom right corner. You may need to click once with the left mouse button in order to move in full-screen mode.
